title: #3 Does U.S. Condone “Torture” or Are We Just Pansies?
description: In this week’s podcast, we discuss the CIA/torture scandal, the #WarOnWomen and the #EricGarner choke case with UFC Champ Pat Miletich.  Do Americans condone torture?  How is it defined?  Have we generally just become a nation of unqualified pansies? Special guests: Gerald Morgan and Krystal Heath!
itunes:author: Blaze Podcast Network
